pageProduct.name: Swisse Ultiboost Mega B + 60 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Swisse Ultiboost Mega B + is a premium quality formula containing vitamins, minerals and antioxidants, to help support the body during times of stress, assist energy production and help reduce fatigue.

Support During Stress: The body may have an increased need for B group vitamins during periods of nervous tension and stress. Vitamins B5 and B6 are important for the adrenals. Healthy adrenal function helps support the body's response to stress. Vitamin C is important for the synthesis of hormones involved in stress response.

Energy Production: Contains high potency B group vitamins to support energy production, important during times of strenuousactivity. B group vitamins, folic acid, vitamin C and magnesium contribute to a reduction in tiredness and fatigue.

Mental Performance: Vitamin B5 helps support healthy mental performance.



Swisse Ultiboost Mega B + is formulated based on scientific evidence with nutrients beneficial for an active and busy lifestyle.

Size: 60 Pack

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare practitioner. Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet.

Ingredients

EACH TABLET CONTAINS:

VITAMIN B1 (thiamine nitrate) 150 mg

VITAMIN B2 (riboflavin) 20 mg

NICOTINAMIDE 200 mg

VITAMIN B5 (pantothenic acid from calcium pantothenate 150 mg) 137.4 mg

VITAMIN B6 (pyridoxine from pyridoxine hydrochloride 50 mg) 41.1 mg

VITAMIN B12 (cyanocobalamin) 60 mcg

FOLIC ACID 400 mcg

BIOTIN 40 mcg

CHOLINE BITARTRATE 25 mg

INOSITOL 25 mg

VITAMIN C (ascorbic acid from calcium ascorbate 145 mg) 119.8 mg

VITAMIN E (as d-alpha tocopheryl acid succinate 82.6 mg) 100 IU

CALCIUM (from calcium hydrogen phosphate 258.2 mg) 60 mg

MAGNESIUM (from magnesium oxide-heavy 49.7 mg) 30 mg

ZINC (from zinc amino acid chelate 27.5 mg) 5.5 mg

POTASSIUM (from potassium phosphate-dibasic 60.1 mg) 27 mg

LEMON BALM (Melissa officinalis) extract equiv. dry leaf 500 mg

Directions

ADULT DOSAGE:

One tablet daily, during or immediately after a meal, or as directed by a healthcare professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25 degrees Celsius. Do not use if cap seal is broken.
